name: Go For a Walk!
description:
Have a delicious small walk through the mountains! Don't be touched!!!

Throw yourself in the volcano to win!!!

Originally a commissioned project, the customer was happy for me to de-personalise the project and share it with you lucky people! Want your own horrible, personalised game? 

Come get one! https://www.fiverr.com/harrybushell?up_rollout=true

CONTROLS:

WASD: move

MOUSE/TOUCHPAD: control camera

SHIFT: Run

SPACE: Jump

Also should be fully playable on game controller
